description.p: *NOTE*: This is an inofficial Flatpak repackaging of the official release of Camunda Modeler.

Camunda Modeler is a low-code visual designer tool to model, connect, and prepare your BPMN business processes for execution. Using standards like BPMN and DMN, you can align IT and business with a common model and language. The result is better, more efficient workflows, delivered faster.

ul.li: Support for upcoming Camunda 8 features You can now create diagrams for Camunda 8.8. We also added support for an updating user task listener.
Better modeling guidance We improved our validation of Camunda 8 ad-hoc subprocesses. Additionally, the modeler now recognizes documentation URLs provided by linter plug-ins.
BPMN modeling improvements Find elements using Camunda-specific search terms. Change the type of an event without losing its implementation details.
Bug fixes and more As always, this release incorporates bug fixes and additional minor improvements.
Support for upcoming Camunda 8 features You can now model an Ad-hoc subprocess and define its active elements. Learn more.
Support for latest Camunda 8 FEEL built-ins The FEEL expression editor now supports the latest built-in functions. Learn more.
Bug fixes and more As always, this release incorporates bug fixes and additional minor improvements.
